replies.body: Before u morons talk about him being op qqing everywhere, actually read the changes, look at the numbers. As someone who has mained many champs including xin this is a gigantic nerf. Just to name a few things: his heal is a shadow of its former self till around lvl 16, his crit every 3rd auto is nerfed massively, no armour shred, q damage down most stages of the game by a tonne, e flat out nerfed 80 damage, as buff moved onto e meaning he needs to use only gap closer to proc it, slow on e is now 0.5 from 2 seconds, shitty w ability, do i need to go on. Hides a gigantic nerf inside a "rework" gg riot on destroying another champion that didnt have pro play or insane win rates they just bored.
I agree, Xin hasn't been in the best place for awhile now and this has done the opposite of helping him.

Look man ive never been upset about any reworks and part of that is cause i dont think ive ever mained a champ pre rework BUT this wasnt designed to buff xin zhao. This was meant to increase his complexity by a slight bit and stop him being a champ with barely 2 real ability's. Your probs right this is a nerf and its gonna be cleaned up if it is, but understand that your champs in the proccess of being made actually interesting to play with or against, cause at the moment xin is probably one of the most basic champs in the game.
ah yes but again who cares OMG RIOT DOESNT KNOW HOW TO FIX THE CHAMPS I KNOW EVERYTHING OHH dude stfu plz
"Xin Zhao falls off pretty hard when teamfights begin." What drugs are you smoking, Riot?

Remember what happened last time a champion's ability was changed to a crescent sweep and forward stab?{{champion:107}} 

You ruined him and pissed off a lot of people.
Well, if you want to be completely correct, the last one was Sejuani.

#Mmm tasty!

He was already the game's greatest single target duelist, and now you've just made his shit AoE, so he can duel the whole team now! instead of just 1 person.

Not to mention he now has ranged poke _(with CC even)_, the one thing that he lacked before.

But it's this that worries me most:
> Finally, we did some general balance tweaks to Xin Zhao (mostly consisting of shifting the steroids from Xin Zhao’s old W to his other abilities).

What this tells me, is that he **still has** all that old W crap, but just alongside all his new fancy AoE abilities...

If you look at the stats they had on pbe, they gutted the healing, its no2 10% bonus ad and 10% ap  and a heal for like  3-37 (1+2 per lv) and the damage is like a 50% boost, and its now on attack effects not on hit effect, so guinsoo doesn't work on it. The q is like 35 base (from 75) and 25% bonus ad from 20% ad. His w is like a 90% bonus ad scale TOTAL and the r is only 2 sec and the slow is like 15%, the e attckspeed maxes at 20% less.

Know what, never mind, his ult is screwed with guinsoo. It increases .3 sec per hit.

But this is arguably [worse](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fSlA09C91sc).

I'm not happy with this, i occasionally play Xin Zhao for a fun and easy lane, because there's not much to worry about and nerfing him into the ground is just going to take more fun out of the game, but riot wouldn't know anything about fun for casual players. Only the Esports that make them money
I like what you have done making a really easy champ to boarder line brain dead champ interesting and his weakness of kiting is less apparent good work{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
